description:
Create your custom calendar and timeslots with a fully customizable Repeating Group.
Great for scheduling apps.


Please read the documentation (in the plugin), the Bubble Editor and the example at the Service URL:

Editor, documentation, step-by-step and example:
https://bubble.io/page?type=page&name=rg-calendar&id=bubble-essential-plugins&tab=tabs-1

Demo page:
https://bubble-essential-plugins.bubbleapps.io/version-test/rg-calendar?debug_mode=true
